text: I've been looking all over internet to buy sims 4 game pack with cheaper price than directly from Origin. Most website required me to use Paypal which I absolutely hate. Instant Gaming got my attention when they allowed me to use my credit card instead. The process was fast, I got the codes almost immediately after complete approved payments. The price is good as well: $20 (instant gaming) vs. $30s (origin)
